name: userreports
description: User statistics tracking tool for GitLab and ClickUp

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.setup: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd server && npm install && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push
scripts.kill: npm run kill:processes && npm run docker:down && echo 'ðŸ›‘ All services stopped successfully'
scripts.kill:processes: echo 'ðŸ›‘ Stopping all UserReports processes...' && pkill -9 -f 'userreports' || true && pkill -9 -f 'npm.*dev' || true && pkill -9 -f 'concurrently' || true && pkill -9 -f 'ts-node-dev' || true && pkill -9 -f 'vite' || true && pkill -9 -f 'esbuild.*userreports' || true && sleep 3 && echo 'âœ… All processes killed'
scripts.restart: npm run kill && sleep 2 && npm run docker:up && npm run dev

scripts.sync: echo 'ðŸ”„ Starting real data sync from GitLab and ClickUp...' && curl -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/sync/manual -H 'Content-Type: application/json' && echo '\nâœ… Real data sync completed!'

scripts.sync:clickup: echo 'ðŸŽ¯ Syncing real ClickUp data...' && curl -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/sync/clickup -H 'Content-Type: application/json' && echo '\nâœ… ClickUp real data sync completed!'
